creator: schrott@gmail.com
text:
compare the smoothness of the graph produced by the
attached testcase in firefox 2.0, where it looks very smooth

in batik 1.7 it looks rather jagged
i have tried scaling, changing width, using polyline instead of path
same result

It's an artifact of how the straight line segments of the path are anti-aliased,
I think.  Sticking a shape-rendering="geometricPrecision" attribute on the root
<svg> element smooths it out nicely.
creator: cam@apache.org
